data.comment: Sandy Walsh is booked for the home team.
Timothy Derijck (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Zulte have got their heads in front thanks to a Gianni Bruno strike.
Zulte have been given a penalty at Regenboogstadion...
Davy De Fauw gives Zulte a 2-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Goal! Terem Moffi (Kortrijk) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
Jovan Stojanovic is replacing Christophe Lepoint for Kortrijk at Regenboogstadion.
The home team have replaced Saido Berahino with Jean-Luc Dompe. This is the first substitution made today by Francky Dury.
Francky Dury is making the team's second substitution at Regenboogstadion with Ewoud Pletinckx replacing Davy De Fauw.
The away team replace Larry Azouni with Habib Gueye.
Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a third substitution, with Nikolaos Kenourgios replacing Gianni Bruno.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
Yves Vanderhaeghe (Kortrijk) is making a third substitution, with Eric Ocansey replacing Terem Moffi.
Gideon Mensah for Zulte has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Kortrijk go level at 2-2 through Tuta in Waregem.
